title: Having issues Patching 6.14? Click Here!
body:
Hey all,

Get ready for some fun in the sun! Get your noodles and inner-tubes ready for a splashing summer bonanza, but remember no running around the pool! 

http://i.imgur.com/g3371sh.gifv

Missing the days when you could push someone into a pool without worrying about their cellphone? We are! At least you won't have to worry about patching issues, because we're here to help! Check out some of the steps above if your patcher is soaked. 
----------------------------------------------

>#***Files Scanned reaches over 9000!!!!! Or, 15k, 20k, etc***

The patcher needs to scan already installed files to make sure that none of the files are corrupt.  If it finds one, it replaces it and rescans the files.  This is why it can sometimes get as high as 20k, even though there aren't 20k files in the installation.  

**The best thing to do is let it scan files!**  If you restart the client, it may cause it to scan even more files.   The patcher will eventually stop scanning files, and it will patch normally afterward.

>#***Patcher never pops up, or disappears after you press "LAUNCH"***

This can be caused by corruption with the patcher itself or it failed to properly self-patch. Additionally, it may be due to some issues with the configuration of your computer system's permissions (meaning it can't properly save the files in the correct location). To resolve this, make sure to complete all the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!

>#***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs [have already whitelisted LoL](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3), however make sure to update yours to the latest version!

Also, even though you may have set specific exceptions in place before for your security program, League of Legends has gone through a major update. Therefore, your security program may recognize the old version of League of Legends, but not the new version. 

To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

--------------------------------------------------------------

*If after completing these steps, and you still do not see the glorious orange 'LAUNCH' button, feel free to drop us a post in this thread!  Rioters as well as Wrenchmen volunteers will be on hand to respond and provide some additional help!*

replies.body: i keep trying to open my shortcut but it sayd the pvp.net patcher kernel has stopped working. how can i fix this problem?
Right click the icon and start it up as adminastrator. It should work ðŸ‘Š

I keep on getting an Error message whenever I attempt to launch the patcher stating that the "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working"; Windows immediately starts to look for solutions, and then follows with the typical "an error has occurred, we'll tell you a solution if we can find one" message. Any help and nudge in the right direction would be appreciated.
Every time i try enter a game i get instant bug splat and reconnect and the same thing happens again and again ever since 6.14. Same was happening for santorin. Any suggestions ?

Sounds like something didn't update right and that's the reason you keep getting bugsplats. Running through our [Crash Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) should stop those bugs for good! If your client continues to crash with this error let me know.

i click on league of legends.exe but it says could not connect to the http server
 wat shud i dooooooo?
Restart your computer and try again.
That doesn't work, I have tried it time and time again. What I discovered is that you must right-click the application and then execute it as administrator.

Hi 

I need to update,  but when it gets on 34% to 38% it comes up with a text saying that a problem  has occured and i need to check my logs or something like that. When i click ok it starts over and same text comes up again.

I have tried running it as administrator, but same problem occured.

Please help me. 

TY!

[Visit Heimyâ€™s Workshop to patch these issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)

http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/c/c5/Heimerdinger_PiltoverCustomsSkin_old.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20120118075912
Ok thank you iÂ´ll try that. :)

It's best to let it scan all the files or leave it to download until it's finish, rather than restarting it.

Since the update seems to be slowing, this could be due to an unstable network. Let us know if your issue is resolved after this or not.

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj
Hey I'm getting a  pvp.net patcher kernel error and it says it has stopped working and i've scanned it multiple times and cleaned up my pc. it still a no go what should I do?
You have to right-click on the application and click on "Execute as administrator" and it should work. Did for me anyways...

Someone help me ffs.... I'm getting mad.I tried to open League( played normally yesterday).Today the league logo is spinning like 15 seconds and  then it shows a RADS error or sometimes PVP. patcher kernel has stopped working.I tried reinstalling same problem,also with the internet protocol,and I watched all fixes on youtube nothing helped.Can someone help me please? Thanks .
You have to right-click on the application and click on "Execute as administrator" and it should work. Did for me anyways...

Man wtf is this I have literally waited 7 and a half hours and it moves like 1-2% every 45 minutes, my internet is fine, league was working fine yesterday, really riot? They release a bugged the shit up client and don't even try to budge and fix it? Thanks... I really wanted to play that reworked Ryze, but no, bugs for days.
We appreciate your help Rinney
I cant login they told me pvp.net patcher Kernel has stopped working what should I do ?

I've restarted the client like 5 times now and its still greyed out?
chamonaaaaa got work today lol trying to play ryze, also it say's something about it not showing that you own his skins, does that mean we can't use them right now?

Cannot access the "Loot & Crafting Inventory" menu. It just returns a black screen every time. Tried on multiple accounts after restarting the client numerous times. It just won't open. Was working fine pre-6.14. Please help with a fix ASAP.

If you experience the recurring 33% stuck patcher, try the following:


Go to: C:/Program Files/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/

Delete the 'solutions' folder in this folder and retry the patcher.

Let me know if this worked for you!

Cloid

as soon as patch 6.14 came, whenever i get into a match my fps drops really-really low to 0.6 and everything is all slow and laggy. this never happened before and i'm not sure what to do. pls help me ;c
I've tried unistalling and reinstalling but its still stuck on 33% what should I do. It said unexpected error has occured
i trurned off my windows security wall and i stoped my antivirus program but my PC still crushing- this time crushed on 38% pls make another pach or i dont know or fix it pls pls pls

i was paching 6.14 when my PC crushed on 33%  everytime. I was scared and i unistall the game. Now i am instaling it again the full gaim and my PC crushes on  33% but not only 33% sometimes goes to 36% and my pc crushes again i will try to turn off my antivirus program for an hour and i really hope to play again lol pls give me samo advices how can i fix it

In the middle of a blind pick game my wifi router stopped working(recently got new internet provider) so i was disconnected from my game. Since it wasn't reconnecting i quit the game and reset my wifi and went right back to my game. After the game ended(we won) i was given a penalty 5 lower priority que for 20 minutes. So this is a total bummer because i didn't purposely rage quit or anything like that its just my wifi went out and i was given a punishment for it. FeelsBadMan, someone at riot please make this right :)

I just dont know what to do anymore if i start league as an admin i get this "connection failure unable to connect to the pvp.net server" after trying tro login
and when im open league normal it always says Update failed: unspecified error ocurred. i tried fkcin everything i watched every video about that issue, i text the support, i reinstalled it 100 times nothing will work.

when i play the screen not lock on my champion. I moved my mouse to conner of my screen and  the screen move with it and my champion is opposite conner of screen. How I can fix it? It's very annoy for me because I usually play in lock champion screen.

So i have had a problem. I went to my sisters house and she had a computer with league on it so i signed into my account on her device. When i come back home and try to update latest patch its very slow, almost as if i was re dowloading league. Does anyone know anything that would help plsss . Thanks

There needs to be a massive change in ranking system. Recently many users stopped playing due to the Overwatch and many people who did not played league started playing league and seem to be in ranks that they do not belong in. Some people just do not want to communicate and some just troll intentionally. There should be ranking system considering kda in some part. for the games that played well should be considered for the ranking points. those who troll and die intentionally cannot stay in the same rank. There has to be some way that those intentional feeders to get demoted or something. I hope new ranking system comes out.

1. Intentional feeders will be banned if they continue to feed in matches. The Intentional Feeder Detection systems takes into account KDA and bans players for numerous deaths and littler to no kills.
2. Trolls or bad players will eventually fall in tiers or divisions as they continue to lose games.

Hi, 

It is now four days that i am disconnected from chat......
I can not see my chat list and I can not communicate with my team during champion select.

I deleted the "menu " file in the folder
C : \ Riot Games \ League of Legends \ RADS \ solutions \ lol_game_client_sln \ releases \ 0.0.1.137 \ deploy \ DATA    
as they told me to do in the ticket.

I disabled the sharing peer-to-peer.

I downloaded the latest version of NVIDIA for my pc and I followed all the steps that we have here:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/it/articles/201752664

Can you help me thanks.

I invited a ticket to support riot games but it's been more than 23 hours and I still have not been answered....

Helpn pls thanks.

A Tech Support Specialist will get to you by Wednesday.

Keep in mind, the [EUNE servers are still experiencing technical difficulties.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/GMBK2qYG-eune-summoners-riot-is-aware-of-your-login-connectivity-difficulties)

Restart your computer. EUNE should not still be experiencing login issues.
i go type my username and pass correctly buy each time it just shows : attempt 1  , attempt 2  , attempt 3 and ERROR !!!!! help me plz
Restart your computer.
already **35k** scanned files >.<
Let it scan, the patcher is repairing corrupt game files as well.

Ok this has happened 2 times to me and its really annoying, When I download the patch, it says it was an error, but it still loaded the game. So when I tried to start a draft game or join any blind pick (I tried custom too) the screen goes black, and after 5 or never, it returns me back to the regular screen. It still lets me purchase stuff, and do my crap with masteries. I have to reinstall twice to fix it the first time. I really need a step by step process, And I already tried online stuff but it screws up my game. Please help, need support.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to top right of the patcher. Hit Repair and let it scan and repair all the game files, you'll see the "Launch" button when it's done.

After the repair, don't reinstall the game again.
I have tried that, I had to reinstall it...
